If Bob accepts Alice's offer, the game will end, and they will divide the money according to Alice's proposal. If Bob decides to proceed to the next round, the money will be worth 20% less for him due to inflation.

It's now Bob's turn again. He needs to decide whether to accept Alice's new offer or proceed to the next round.

And so the game continues, with each player trying to negotiate a better deal while considering the effects of inflation. The game is a test of negotiation skills, strategy, and the ability to adapt to changing circumstances.
